content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Get both Smash Cars and Virus Run for one low price. Smash Cars delivers real-time physics, innovative stunts and next-generation graphics in this tricked-out single and multiplayer RC car racing experience where players twist and turn, grind and gear up, performing aerial tricks and stunts while racking up trophies and points. With the included Virus Run add-on you can enjoy local multiplayer Split Screen gameplay where you can race your RC car against a friend as they perform aerial tricks and stunts as only Smash Cars can! Plus, the Virus Run six-player online mode presents new rules, new races and a cool new playground location, featuring a skate park and half pipe. Play as the dangerous "infected" car and spread the virus to your competition, or keep away from your marked opponent and sacrifice your fellow racers to survive and win.
